== William Davies ==

Hello! I am William Davies, also known in the <nowiki>[[http://wedothatradio.wordpress.com/|ham radio world]]</nowiki> as <nowiki>[[http://n3gbz.gbztechnology.com|N3GBZ]]</nowiki> and as <nowiki>[[http://wptoday.com/|The Watkins Man]]</nowiki> in the business world.  I have been an open source advocate for quite some time.  My role within the community is primarily one of promoting and advocating Linux and Open Source Software using my experiences as a Software Engineer for Unisys Corporation for many years and most recently as an Internet Marketer and Consultant.

* '''IRC''': n3gbz (irc.freenode.net)

* Promoting Linux and Open Source Software at every opportunity
